channel.title: CVE Feed for ADiTaaS -- Allied Digital Integrated Tool-as-a-Service
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ADiTaaS -- Allied Digital Integrated Tool-as-a-Service

item.title: CVE-2023-6483|2024-08-02T08:28:21.823Z -- aditaas -- allied%20digital%20integrated%20tool-as-a-service
item.description:
The vulnerability exists in ADiTaaS (Allied Digital Integrated Tool-as-a-Service) version 5.1 due to an improper authentication vulnerability in the ADiTaaS backend API. An unauthenticated remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending specially crafted HTTP requests to the vulnerable platform.
Successful exploitation of this vulnerability could allow the attacker to gain full access to the customersâ€™ data and completely compromise the targeted platform.
